about_the_game:
Equip yourself with essential knowledge and expert advice with the digital guidebook, providing in-depth explanations, helpful support, and invaluable tips & tricks for mastering Serum's challenges, its biomes, Serum upgrades, weapons and more.

How to access the Digital Goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game’s install directory within their respective folder in Steam\SteamApps\common\Serum after the DLC has finished downloading.
